name: 除权除息
description: 获取股票的除权除息信息
request_description: Prefix(0C) + MsgID(0C000000) + Control(01) + Length(0900) + Length(0900) + Type(0F00) + Data(...)
response_description: Prefix(B1CB7400) + Control(1C) + MsgID(0C000000) + Unknown(00) + Type(0F00) + ZipLength(...) + Length(...) + CompressedData(...)

structure.items: 每个记录包含除权除息相关信息

notes: 除权除息数据用于计算复权价格
